          <title>
            <string language="no">Forkorte brøk</string>
            <string language="en">Simplify a fraction.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Vereinfachen Sie einen Bruch.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Simplifiez une fraction.</string>

            <string language="x-mt-es">Simplifique una fracción.</string>
          </title>
          <language>no</language>
          <description>
            <string language="no">Øv på å forkorte brøker. Klarer du å finne den beste løsningen med en gang?</string>
            <string language="en">Practise Simplifying fractions.Can you find the best solution the first time?</string>
          </description>

            <string language="no">brøk</string>

beste Lösung das erste mal finden?</string>
          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-fr">Pratiquez la simplification de fractions.Can que vous

          </description>
